channel.title: Starter only once

item.title: Starter only once
item.dc:creator: @_Kaos [Kaos]
item.description:
@_Kaos wrote:

That still wont work, you could just log in and out then BOOM type ::starter again and you got cash.

You need to add it into the saves.

Search for

public boolean savemoreinfo()

And I’m sure you can figure the rest out. You need to learn how to do these easy tasks.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter only once
item.dc:creator: @mady mady
item.description:
@mady wrote:

then try this
replace this with your starter code


	if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {
		if (starter == 0) {
		
		addItem(995,15000000);
		sendMessage("This is your starter pack Enjoy");
		starter = 1;
	}
	else if (starter == 1) {
		sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!");
	}
}

and search for something like this

/* MISC */

under that add this

public int starter = 0;

now it works

Read full topic

item.title: Starter only once
item.dc:creator: @Marc323909 Marc323909
item.description:
@Marc323909 wrote:

Make a copy of u client.java (so if u go wrong its doesnt matter)

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(995, 25000000); sendMessage("Spend this wisely!"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("Already got your Marc Pk Scape starter, noob -.-"); } [code][/code]
